content: Singaporean reality television series ***Sun Tzu: War on Business*** (*literally:* "Master Sun â€” War on Business") was a Singaporean [reality television](/wiki/Reality_television) series broadcast by [Channel NewsAsia](/wiki/Channel_NewsAsia) and distributed by [BBC Worldwide](/wiki/BBC_Worldwide). In the show presenter [James Sun](/wiki/James_Sun) traveled around the world helping entrepreneurs and their businesses to achieve their goals using the principles of *[The Art of War](/wiki/The_Art_of_War)*. The series premiered in March 2010 and last aired in 2011. ## International distribution The show aired in the US on the [National Geographic Channel](/wiki/National_Geographic_Channel) in March 2010. title: Sun Tzu: War on Business
